q.quote: In many ways, I've been writing personal stories all my life.
q.author: Alice Munro

q.quote: I always feel the movement is a sort of mosaic.
q.author: Alice Paul

q.quote: Justice is better than chivalry if we cannot have both.
q.author: Alice Stone Blackwell

q.quote: I think it pisses God off if you walk by the color purple in a field somewhere and don't notice it.
q.author: Alice Walker

q.quote: Whenever I want to know how to cook something, I can't ask one chef, I have to ask six.
q.author: Alice Waters

q.quote: I always want to stay focused on who I am, even if I'm discovering who I am .
q.author: Alicia Keys

q.quote: Being vegan just gives you such great karma
q.author: Alicia Silverstone

q.quote: As soon as tradition has come to be recognized as tradition, it is dead
q.author: Allan Bloom

q.quote: I surrond myself with people who make me laugh.
q.author: Allen Iverson

q.quote: Even the smallest daily chore can be humanized with the harmony of culture.
q.author: Alvar Aalto

q.quote: One of the worst things about racism is what it does to young people.
q.author: Alvin Ailey

q.quote: Change is not merely necessary to life - it is life.
If you want to do something, you find a way.
q.author: Amber Heard
